content: I am an artificial intelligence and don't have the ability to browse the internet or watch game trailers. However, game studios and developers often release game trailers to showcase their upcoming games, and many of them use impressive visual effects to generate excitement among gamers. Some highly anticipated game trailers that are currently generating a lot of buzz include Elden Ring by FromSoftware, God of War Ragnarok by Santa Monica Studio, Starfield by Bethesda Game Studios, and Horizon Forbidden West by Guerrilla Games. These are just a few examples, and there are sure to be many more exciting game trailers on the horizon.
